category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MEAccountabilityUseCacheless
preference.preference_description: Accelerates the accountability check when part of a BOM source is compared to an entire bill of process (BOP) target and the Missing in Source option is not selected. This functionality relies on the cacheless search in a bill of process. In some cases, such as when using generic design elements (GDEs), this is not supported. If the data has such lines, set the preference value to false. Valid Values: true - The accountability check uses the cacheless search to accelerate the check. false - The accountability does not use the cacheless search to accelerate the check.
